website_summaries.verdict: While it's not terribly compact, the Nyne Bass lives up to its name and outperforms many portable Bluetooth speakers that cost more.
pros: The Nyne Bass is an attractively designed wireless Bluetooth speaker that delivers fuller sound than other speakers in the $150/£125 price range
It also has an integrated mic for speakerphone calls, NFC tap-to-pair technology for smartphones that support it, and uses Bluetooth 4.0
Battery life is decent at 10 hours
cons: Yes, it's a portable speaker, but it's not all that travel-friendly

customer_reviews.title: WARNING product quality/durability problems; great price; great delivery
customer_reviews.text: I like it immensely if/when it keeps working - best sound EVER! I have owned three of these; two have failed; dead... after a few hours of use; no power after charging. Not user-serviceable. Nyne technical support is NONEXISTENT - I open a ticket, then they close my ticket automatically with NO resolution, multiple times. "Talk to the hand". I am satisfied with the one Nyne Bass that (still) works, but generally I am not satisfied. Buy a UE. Great price; prompt delivery, as stated. When this Nyne Bass fails, I will buy an additional UE from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lowers

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours for just shy of a year. It stopped working for absolutely no reason. The sound was great, we used it frequently. It filled our whole house with music. It stayed in our house or in the shade if outside, never exposed to water, never dropped and it just quit and wouldn’t come back on. Highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mommarae09

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought this wasn't that great of a speaker...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older set of speakers. I use my speakers at work over night at the grocery store. I plug them in at one end of the aisle, and have my music blasting while I stock the shelves. At first when you turn the volume up all the way on the speakers themselves, it doesn't seem like this thing gets very loud, but if you crank up the volume on your device you have plugged into/synced to the speakers as well, it BLASTS! Like, hurt your ears bad loud, which is perfect for annoying everyone I work with, and ensuring that I can hear my music from one end of the aisles to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Style

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great value, broken AUX port.
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the best bluetooth speaker I've ever purchased and it rivals the Beats Boombox in sound, clarity and bass. The only problem is that a year later, the AUX jack stopped working and the original seller on Amazon has ignored my request for a copy of my invoice to send to Nyne for repairs (although it's already out of warranty). It still works great as a bluetooth speaker, but it's a shame I can't plug in devices directly anymore.
customer_reviews.author: King Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use at work. We play music all day. We were using a tiny Bose speaker. This speaker came packaged in a beautiful box. It comes with the charger & multiple power outlet adaptors & an audio cord. Extremely easy to pair with phone. What I love is that when I connect Pandora, we can skip songs or pause with the large easy to see buttons on top. The sound is nice and full, rich and warm with bass. My coworkers were really surprised at the quality vs cost. My boss told me that everyone he knows is getting one the next Christmas. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: P.V.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this is August and have used maybe 6 times and it has stopped working. It powers on and allows bluetooth pairing, but it will not play music, not even from being directly connected through the line in. I read the reviews before I bought it and I knew I was rolling the dice... this time I got burned. Not with the price tag for the couple of uses I got out of it. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Sagseason

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bang for the buck speaker that doesn’t disappoint. I’ve had this speaker now for two and a half year and have put it to good use. Battery is still going strong and sound quality is as good as the day I purchased it. Great speaker at a very affordable price. This speaker has been brought on numerous vacations and outdoor family events. Every time I bring it to a family or friend event someone always asks where I got it and how much and then purchase it shortly after. Idk about support from the manudacturer as I have never had an issue but the product itself is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sounded great and had lots of bass. Bluetooth worked but the range wasn't great, maybe 25 feet at best. I had to keep my phone right next to the speakers instead of my pockets in case I walked away. Unfortunately the speakers lasted less than 2 years, after the warranty expired. It only produced very faint music at max volume when it stopped working. I'd probably look into a more reputable brand like JBL next time.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: REALLY good speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to put under the back seat of my truck as sort of a bootleg subwoofer and it actually works REALLY good. The bass on is great and you can really feel it, but nothing too insane. The sound quality overall is great and would definitely sound good at a house party or small outdoor event. The only thing that I just realized is that it isn't water proof so I guess just be careful placing it around water.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Sticky Gooey Mess
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Nyne Bass in September 2014 and loved it enough to purchase another for my daughter attending college. It suits my needs perfectly and and only use it 3 or 4 times a year mostly when listening to Pandora on the patio or when camping. However, I haven't used it in a couple years and had it stored in my audio/video cabinet in a climate controlled environment (home). The rubberized plastic housing has turned to a gooey sticky mess. Somewhat disappointed with long tern build quality. I guess an equipment lifespan of 10+ years in todays manufacturing and marketing environment is asking too much.
customer_reviews.author: Luther

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, very poor range
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I mainly use it in my car to listen to music/podcasts. I bring it to patio parties for background music. The Bluetooth range is very poor. I am not even 5 feet away and it breaks up. Tried it with about a dozen different phones with same result. Not very useful unless you are sitting next to it or leave the music source very nearby. I don't have experience with any other Bluetooth speakers to compare to, however; a Bluetooth stereo adapter I use works through walls without a hiccup. Maybe there is a tradeoff between range and battery life? Please comment if you are in the know.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kilinski

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, a great Bluetooth speaker. The sound is very clear, and the bass sounds tremendous. You can pair your devices such as laptop, smartphones, tablets. The range is very good, approximately 30 ft according to the manual, and the sound is very loud as well, not that big and easy to carry, well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Stopped producing noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker because my friend has one and I fell in love with it. But after my speaker ran out of charger completely it would no longer produce noise. (This happened after 3 month time I usually charged it before died completely) I went threw the company to try to fix the problem and they wanted me to ship it back to them for this obvious defect and they said I have to pay for the shipping. This speaker weights so much it would cost me the price of the speaker to ship. I am very disappointed in this product I loved so much. Didn't even last 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!! Beware of the seller.
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker !! What I didn’t like is the seller of this speaker because I bought one at a cheaper price and it stopped working so I asked the seller will they honor me a another one at the same price I got no response from them !! Not good business. But I liked this speaker so much that I bought another one th the full price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. It sounds so nice, the bass is definitely a nice feature as well which is what I was looking for. Syncing up to the speaker is also easy as holding down the button and turning the bluetooth on in my phone. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because when outside, the whole reason for a portable speaker, it was not as loud as anticipated. If you are within 20 feet, you have no problem hearing but when there gets to be a gathering of people, the chatter can drown out the music. Good quality product though and it comes with different plug attachments so you can use/charge all around the world!!
customer_reviews.author: iLint

customer_reviews.title: This speaker sounds great. I wanted something that was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds great. I wanted something that was a little bigger, louder and better without spending too much. Nyne delivers good and loud music with solid bass. I do have 2 concerns. First, there is slight ground/line noise from my audio chromecast dongle. I power it from the usb port on the NYNE and feed it in through the aux input. The line noise is only audible between songs. Blutooth is very clean with no interference. The second thing that concerns me is that some of the reviews stated that it works great then suddenly goes dead... I am hoping that mine lasts 5-10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Very good for backyard movies' sound,  with a Bluetooth transmitter for longer distance.
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to achieve a good sound for backyard movies because one is outdoors. I paired this with a Bluetooth transmitter rather than using the laptop Bluetooth and got a good sound (this is not stereo). We were delighted to clearly hear what people in the movie were saying. Bluetooth pairing may require patience.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Nousiainen

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite bluetooth speaker! Its hard to believe that so much bass can come from a portable speaker like this but it works perfect! It is a little heavy but not bad, just feels well built. It will last all day at full volume. My favorite part is I can take it to the beach and still be able to hear it over the wind and waves. The ability to charge your phone from its usb port is a nice bonus. I do not consider myself a true audiophile but I do like good speakers and to me this speaker sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Sound was very nice, clear
customer_reviews.text: Sound was very nice, clear, crisp, and had enough bass. Used the speaker in conjunction with a laptop and short throw projector. Sound was loud enough for the viewing party outside and was not drowned out by the chat of others. Why 3 stars? Power button stopped working. Power LED indicator light is on(plugged in wall) but will not cycle on. In past three weeks only used it less than a dozen times.
customer_reviews.author: Balbrecher

customer_reviews.title: Great value and excellent bass.
customer_reviews.text: After a year still rocking.. The bass is beginning to flutter tho. Only downside, the volume always has to be turned up when first playing. Doesn't remain at the level when it was last turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yazzie

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. I have owned one for almost two years. I absolutely love it I use it on job site and have beat it to death and it still works and sounds perfect. pic is 1st one
customer_reviews.author: DWAYNE W.

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of others, equal or better
customer_reviews.text: Read many reviews before purchasing the Nyne bass. Every one that has come over and listened to it has had a positive thought on the speaker. My one friend has the beats pill. We did a comparison and the Nyne Bass is better. And its half the price. Pros: *Solid feeling *Shape allows it to roll over on itself if you accidentally knock it over *Bass pumps loud *Charge lasts forever *Bluetooth pairing easy as pie Cons: At this time, there are no cons to the device. About me: I like sound. I have a good ear. I like dance music and rap music. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Bengston

customer_reviews.title: The battery is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is awesome and the subwoofer is great! The thing that blows my mind is the wireless battery life. It’s soo good! Connect the phone via Bluetooth and it just won’t die lol. Best speaker I’ve purchased in a while. Far better than the Harmon K’s. Had 2 of those and they never worked this well!
customer_reviews.author: Wylie the Toy Aussie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the dollar!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased MANY Bluetooth speakers, but THIS one, has BLOWN ME AWAY!! Trusted, it’s larger than most of my others, but WOW! The sound is incredible! & previous reviews said there’s no highs n sound, WRONG! Not only does it have good low bass, it has high clarity! I’m VERY satisfied
customer_reviews.author: D.C. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a full sounding system that I could easily carry and this is about as good as I've ever heard. It sounds amazing on some songs and on some it misses some of the mid-tones on some songs. I"ve had a lot of friends ask about it and some have bought it as well. I use it all of the time and it's great. It fills the gym and classroom when needed and has been a great hit.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: One happy teenager!
customer_reviews.text: I got my teenage daughter this as a Christmas gift. My daughter loves it and all I can hear is stuff rattling in her room because of the bass. She's absolutely crazy about "feeling" the bass, and this does just that. Arrived when expected and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: kellyr

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: The battery eventually stops working and you can only use your speakers while connected. Yet, the sound quality is the best in the market. I am a musician and can simply tell you to forget about overpriced Bose, Sonos, Bang & Olufsen speakers, the quality and loudness of this speaker is way about the other brands and at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, loud bass, great battery life, very portable and tough.
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic unit!! The sound is great and battery life has been great too! I also have a Bose sound dock II and this is WAY better in both loudness and tonal accuracy over a wider spectrum. It will fill your 3 car garage, your modest/average sized backyard, or your entire floor in a home with good sound. I use it while doing yard work, working on the car, or working around the house. Recently I had it up pretty loud for over 4 hours and it didn't change volume once.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gard

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud for a party of 10-15 in a garage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for my daughter when here friends hang out in the game room. It's plenty loud, the bass is perfect. It's not a car stereo where it shakes your chest or anything but it's audibly present. The lower frequencies on rap songs are definitely there where cheap speakers just don't have that audible hint of bass. Is it good for a party where you still can talk, yes, it's perfect for that. Is it club speakers loud? Really, do you have to ask that. I'm sure electronics will continue to improve but I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RSCM

customer_reviews.title: All about that bass...
customer_reviews.text: Surprise, it is all about bass. The speaker is 8/10 for loudness, certainly louder than my JBL Charge 2plus. The Bass 9/10 on par with beats, but not all muddy very punchy bass. Portability 4/10. It is 6 pound speaker and longer than a foot i do not know how you can call that portable. I just wish there was a charge indicator that tells me how much battery i have left. This is my favorite speaker and would make those snooty audiophiles cringe, but everyone in your neighborhood would think a party is in your house.
customer_reviews.author: Adrion

customer_reviews.title: Fired up, right out of the box...wife has to have one for herself!  Great sound!  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I fired it up with my phone's music app in front of my wife, she had to have one for herself. So, I ordered another immediately. The audio range is impressive with great bass (that I demand) and very clean highs for such a portable, stand-alone speaker. The price is very reasonable. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: West HIlls Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really rocks. I've been through various bluetooth speakers and this is by far the best. The bass is deep and pronounced, making the music sound full. At full volume it is not distorted at all. It's a little bigger than most speakers, if that's an issue for you. Sounds fantastic in my bathroom while showering. I am COMPLETELY satisfied with this speaker. In my opinion, it sounds a lot better than UE Boom, Big Jambox, Bose, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Jack

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SPEAKER, AMAZING SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing. It has surround sound no matter where you place it. It lasts for ever without needing to be charged again. You can use this outside and indoors and have an amazing sound experience. I'm very picky when it comes to speaker sound quality, so take this advice from me, you will not be disappointed! Sometimes depending on the song though it will have static if you turn it up all the way up, so make sure your music is legit LOL. You will not be disappointed and it arrived within a week for me. Very pleased! Great product & seller.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great little...er...big portable speaker!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Great overall sound and great bass. purchased to use with my portable projector for movies on the go with the right punch for booming sounds. It's not just bass though, overall it is balanced and full sounding. I am impressed and it is well worth the current price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon in CA

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound, very pronounced bass and loud
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this are correct, excellent sound, very pronounced bass and loud. For the money, the absolute best Bluetooth speaker have ever owned. It's hard to believe that this much sound comes from something the size. The weights and build quality of this appears to be very sturdy. I've only charged once, so I can't comment how accurate the 10 hour battery life is, but but I've been playing it ever since with no decrease in sound quality and battery strength. The Bluetooth connectivity is excellent and the range is quite impressive also. you will not be disappointed with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty awesome, specially if you are a bass fan such as I. But it is not small. Sure it is easy to move around, it has a built in handle, but it still is about the size of a loaf of bread (basically). It feels solidly built, nothing flimsy or cheap. Ready to pair with. Nice indicators, easy to use buttons.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reif

customer_reviews.title: Nyne Bass vs Bose
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a much more balanced sound spectrum compared to my Bose Sound Dock 10, although not as loud... and it is "PORTABLE!" If overwhelming bass at high volume and hardly any bass at low volume is what you like, then this unit is not for you. Move over, Bose.., there is a new sound in town!
customer_reviews.author: chp452 Guam

customer_reviews.title: June 2018 I'll be two years since a purchase this little boy
customer_reviews.text: Is very very good Bluetooth speaker for the price and sounds very good too after two year of use ....everyday..... June I'll be two years with this little boy ....as you can see I droop it multiple times and melt down the buttons due to the heat on my kitchen but still works like a champ , still getting 5 hours out of 8 at full volume on the battery life after 2 years .
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay until 3 months in the Bluetooth connection just stopped working. It won't connect to a new device or a previously connected one. Also, doesn't get as loud as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lorenski

customer_reviews.title: BOOM
customer_reviews.text: This thing is aimed toward the bass music crowd (being part of the rave scene myself) you have to get this! The sub is REALLY nice, descent volume, and has everything you would expect a bluetooth speaker to have. At higher volumes around max, bass distorts the music (probably eq tuning problem). Comes with a buttload of plug adapters so you can plug it into any socket, and also comes with an aux cord if something doesn't have bluetooth capabilities. Sleek look with rubber trim and big square rubber buttons along the top for ease of use. A little bit heavy (not complaining) probably due to sub magnet and internals
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Speaker sounds great! Bought on July 4
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds great! Bought on July 4, 2015 Stopped working about a month ago. Couldn't figure out why. It would turn on, but then immediately shut off. Found an old charger that would fit it. Plugged it in, and working great again. I'm guessing a lot of the problems people are having with the speaker not working anymore, are faulty chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Disco Inferno

customer_reviews.title: way better than Bose
customer_reviews.text: Look out Bose! This speaker really thumps for a portable speaker, yep, way better than Bose. "Its all about da bass..." I tried them all and none had a real bass punch except this one. If you want clarity and big sound for a speaker about the size of a loaf of bread than pull the trigger on this deal. You can thank me later. =) P.S. if you switch back and forth from the speaker jack to blue tooth don't forget to unplug the jack and the blue tooth connects automatically. This puppy did not even NEED directions although it came with 26 languages!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Mama

customer_reviews.title: The Next Best Thing to Surround Sound
customer_reviews.text: I poured over the reviews here on Amazon and thank you everyone, you really helped. Yes, if you don't want a lot of bass, don't get these speakers. For me, the bass has been perfect for streaming TV shows and movies. The speakers have a convenient handle to carrying the speakers around to different areas of my home as needed. And if I would ever want to bring them outside, it's looking like I have a water resistant, if not waterproof set of portable speakers.
customer_reviews.author: AymTru

customer_reviews.title: Love the base
customer_reviews.text: Love the base! It gets you in the mood to dance and it's very loud. Great for a party. I ordered the black one for my brother because he usually likes listening to music with a loud base. Unfortunately he barely uses it. On the other hand, my sister also loves listening to music with a loud base so she uses it sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Her

customer_reviews.title: So far good.
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks in and the sound is great. Limited reach for playing music off of my phone. I was hoping I could stream music and keep my phone handy while doing some work in the garage. It seemed like if I kept the phone on me the sound was intermittent. If I placed the phone 3-5 ft from the speaker it would work no problem. I hope the battery life lasts through the summer as I plan to use this frequently at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not as Powerful as Before
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker some time ago. The speaker was orange on the sides back then. Its silver now. Back then the speaker had A LOT of bass, and the volume was louder. I bought this one thinking I'd get the same result. For whatever reason, the bass was sacrificed on this speaker. I only buy bluetooth speakers if they have the bass. Manufacturer needs to go back to engineering these the way they were when the speaker had orange on it.
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad battery & support
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality for the money, but battery failed to hold any charge after a year. Tech support is non existent, so I had to crack open the case to determine the replacement (four 18650 cells wired together).
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best portable speakers on the market. Excellent sound and comfortable design to use wherever you want. Its sound is as good as the Bose brand but at a better price. If you like to hear music with a good sound you have to buy this article.
customer_reviews.author: plutyc

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best speakers I’ve owned, including those twice the price. This thing has a good bit of bass but beyond that has good sound balance in general. I always get compliments from friends when hosting parties etc. don’t use nfc much but it works. Call sound is probably what you expect - it’s just what your phone sounds like but louder, though I’ve never had issues with others hearing me. Can’t recommend this speaker enough
customer_reviews.author: Logan House

customer_reviews.title: Look like a repack and it was suppose to be new
customer_reviews.text: Received it on time but it looks like some one received it before me. I thought I was buying a new unit. I do like it. But if someone buys new it should be new
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wendt

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I put it in my office and use it daily -- be it to listen to music I am streaming, play the audio from a webinar or even connect a conference call. Sound quality is much more full than the "standard" speakers one finds to connect to work stations (e.g. JBL) and the bass is powerful without the Bose experience of feeling over-tuned. I also love that I can leave this plugged in so that it's always ready. And, when I need to love it to another part of the office, the ample battery charge is available to keep the tunes going. I highly recommend the Nyne speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks or feels
customer_reviews.text: It sounds a bit too muffled and doesn’t get super loud for its size. Bluetooth works only so far, just a room away is too far
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Beavers

customer_reviews.title: Just outside of the return timeline he said it made a loud "pop" noise and the music that came out sounded muffled/echo like. He said he was going to send to ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my gf's father. Just outside of the return timeline he said it made a loud "pop" noise and the music that came out sounded muffled/echo like. He said he was going to send to Nyne for warranty repair so can't say if that has happened yet or not. But he really liked it up until then!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Neely

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this outperforms many other speakers twice it's value. The battery lasts a long time. The bass is awesome. There is only a little bass port noise. Also, it doesn't sacrifice any detail. The clarity is great. It's on the larger side, but it has a carrying handle so it is still portable. Try it out, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Unit, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: The sound/bass quality is really good...the battery life is great also, but the USB charging port does not work and never has from Day 1. But the unit is nice overall...if the USB worked which I’m sure any and Everyone who has this loves due to is supposedly charging capability than I would give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speakers I've owned to date (LOW END HEAVY)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. The battery lasts forever and it sounds wonderful. I bought this knowing it was going to be bass heavy so please keep in mind this thing is designed to be bass heavy. If you're not looking for something with a ton of low end, look at something else.Super easy pairing and this thing gets LOUD! Best bluetooth speakers i've owned hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Micah J.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: It only took me five minutes to realize I hit a home run with this speaker, the sound is amazing! fills the entire room with a rich bass and crystal clear sound. The bass is not over powering at all. Paired with my iPhone 6 by simply placing it next to the speaker. Good solid feel to the speaker with weather proof buttons on top. I love that I can charge my phone at the same time. I strongly reccomend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Deep bass with crystal clear highs.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about a month now. Great sound. Deep bass with clean, crisp highs. Crystal clear at low and high volumes. I listen to several genres of music as well as podcasts, and it all sounds great. A little bit bigger than I had expected but still light enough to carry from room to room without any discomfort. Connected to my phone in seconds. I had it set up and playing my favorite playlist within five minutes of being delivered. I want to make this review fair and balanced but really I haven't found anything I don't like about this product yet.
customer_reviews.author: Snapbacks&Vlados

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great speaker volume and awesome battery life. Cons: the bass is muddy at moderate to high volume
customer_reviews.author: Gary Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Rattle rattle .....
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality but not really that loud. Sounds like mine Is defective. Rattled at half power.
customer_reviews.author: Chad in VA Beach

customer_reviews.title: Best Speaker under $100
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, very good bass, will play loud but also good sound at lower levels. love it for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Deuce

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of bass, plenty of volume. Can't compare ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of bass, plenty of volume. Can't compare with the BOSE Sound Link Mini as this speaker is 5x it's size. Think of this speaker as more of a small gathering speaker vs. the Sound Link Mini as a personal speaker. Note- you get much more volume from the BT connection vs. the 3.5mm audio connection.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound! Great bass! Lasts about a year!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker! Lasted about a year though. Sound quality and bass response is amazing on this thing! My subwoofer just died though. I emailed their support who is an outsourced company. They quoted $80 plus shipping costs to send it in for repairs. I decided to just use it for classic rock on the patio and bought a Bumpboxx for the killer sound needs. Still, it's a great speaker. Just don't expect more than a year or so out of it. It go for the Sport.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Darn good speaker
customer_reviews.text: I do not love too many products but this is a great portable speaker. I especially like the fact that I can use a cord to connect my iPod classic. The sound is impressive on a wide variety of music to include YoYo Ma and Queen or audible books. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: k in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Big fan to NYNE products 100%
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these now. These put out alot of rich sound and bass. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bird

customer_reviews.title: not bad. Overally finishing is good & set up is ...
customer_reviews.text: Performance is generally on par with the Roar, not bad. Overally finishing is good & set up is simple. The red color aux cable is a little too funky, prefer the usual black to blend with the other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: George W.

customer_reviews.title: the sound is good but the speaker has a mind of its own
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasts long, the sound is good but the speaker has a mind of its own. It only turns on when it wants to and some time not at all. To turn it off I have to hit the switch as opposed to pressing the button. I can only depend on a good quality of sound less then half of the time so It's not a good quality speaker overall.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is our third NYNE speaker! Phenomenal product. Great sound. Easy to use. We bought this one for my elderly mom. She loves it and loves that it’s not complicated for her to use. Truly a great product!
customer_reviews.author: bgarza

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 charge
customer_reviews.text: It only worked once!!!!! The battery operation stopped working after one charge. Now it will only play if it's plugged into the wall. Would not recommend this product at all
customer_reviews.author: James York

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is typically the best if you really love good music especially BASS
customer_reviews.text: It's loud enough and has very deep bass, I never expected it to be this good and this good-looking, I have ever used a bit the JBL Xtreme which is in fact really good but this speaker is way better especially with how well the bass hits. With the price, this is the best deal you can get on a portable well-surrounded Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.author: John Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: This sounded amazing but we returned it. We own the big brother to this and thid wasn't incredibly smaller so we sent it back. I wish i had bought this size first instead of the big one.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this Bluetooth speaker outside by our hot tub. This speaker has excellent sound, powerful bass, and has great battery life. We love it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn N.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn’t....
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds really great and hits the bass hard. I loved it. But after only a few uses, it just stopped working. Won’t power on and won’t charge. Really a shame. It was after the return period so i am stuck with it. Wish i could exchange it somehow but no luck. I would steer away and get a different product.
customer_reviews.author: frank finklestein

customer_reviews.title: Great, Inexpensive Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: On par with more expensive Bluetooth speakers. Great sound and bass. It can definitely blow.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy L Rice Jr

customer_reviews.title: Super bass!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the loud bass it has a great sound ! ! I use it all the time as a house portable speaker I can take room to room weather I am cooking or showering. It’s easily transported.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. It’s super easy to hold but durable at the same time. Sound quality is lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: ... received my NYNE Bass speaker and this is a GREAT Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Just received my NYNE Bass speaker and this is a GREAT Bluetooth speaker. I like the larger size and solid construction of it. The sound is very good.....but I don't think anything will ever touch the sound of the Harmon Kardon Go-Play unit (albeit mine is old school, no Bluetooth, but the HK sound is simply AMAZING!) Love the Bluetooth and rechargeable battery on the NYNE. Cannot be beat for $140.00
customer_reviews.author: D. Painter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.text: Great. It was louder than I expected or needed but it looks great and the price is perfect. Fast overnight delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: GOOD speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My friend had this speaker before I purchased it so I knew what it was capable of. Not too many speakers out here with a built in subwoofer so thats why this one is a must for me. Has GREAT bass and GOOD sound Quality! Its loud (for those bad reviews saying its not loud enough). Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Aguilar Fam

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it in for repair
customer_reviews.text: This was the best reviewed speaker in my price range on a site I trust so I decided to go for it. Doesn't get super super loud like I was hoping, but great sound and bass level. People frequently ask where I got it and how much I paid for it. Took a star off because the bass died early on and I had to send it in for repair. Shipping cost me ~$10.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Sound it's perfect but after 6 months battery doesn t keep charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound it's perfect but after 6 months battery doesn t keep charge so I can't use anymore Bass company never answer calls .
customer_reviews.author: AUGUSTINE

customer_reviews.title: Unexceptional battery
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 4 - 5 stars when I first bought it. The sound quality is great. But now that it is a few months later, the battery barely lasts an hour. You have to keep it plugged in to use it for any extended period of time, which kind of defeated the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Georgianna

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: We use this mostly outside when we are camping. This speaker has great sound and plenty of volume. The only downside is the Bluetooth range is a bit on the weak side. All in all I am very pleased with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: This speaker packs a nice punch. I've owned quite a few different Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This speaker packs a nice punch. I've owned quite a few different Bluetooth speakers and this is one of the best I've had. It costs a lot less than the other speakers I've owned and sounds as good or better. I seem to prefer this sound over my bose sounddock portable. Both are very nice speakers though.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Rig

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice box the sound is exceptional, the bass is extremely powerful for the size box, I think the only think This box need is a remote,
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker, not great
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, nice indoor speaker. I wanted to use outdoors and it wasn’t near powerful enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier B

customer_reviews.title: Buy Buy Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker by far I have owned. Loud, deep, and sturdy. You will not find a better speaker in this price range I promise you that. Great for any outdoor setting- BBQ's, tailgating, beach, patio or porch, or any group setting. Buy it! You will blow people away with the sound
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: Big Bass and plenty loud.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great. My brother and I heard one at Big Lee's BBQ food truck in Ocala FL and loved the sound. Now we have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: dayvcrocket

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is simply awesome..
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is simply awesome... this is how portable speakers should sound... comes in at 6 pounds but it is portable with built in handle...35 watts of pure power.... thumping bass with clear highs and vocals and for 150 dollars its a steal compared to the jawbones and beat pills XL... you will be surprised how loud this thing gets. Perfect for basement parties and intimate outdoor gatherings don't get me wrong its not a block party blaster but small parties or jamming in your house this does the job..... Google to see the positive reviews from CNET and others... I never write reviews but this made me have to tout its praises
customer_reviews.author: C. Desouza

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, will blow out the sub at full volume with wrong song.
customer_reviews.text: The sounds is really good. So hard to find a 'portable' wireless speaker that has any bass. This has just bass enough to keep me satisfied ( I use on my boat). The speaker will blow if the wrong song with a heavy bass note comes on at full volume. Bose would never let a speaker fry itself like that! price is good for what you get, just don't go full volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is what you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend's son is literally BLOWN AWAY by this speaker. We've been looking for a great "thumping" speaker where he could blast his music the way he likes and this one fits the bill. He throws it in his backpack and walk around the neighborhood. Quality and the sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Warden

customer_reviews.title: Not party worthy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Sound quality good. Volume is a problem. In my home as background is nice. Took it to a party and was disappointed at volume for the size of the unit. Someone brought a speaker 1/2 the size and it cranked out the loud music!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri C.

customer_reviews.title: like new
customer_reviews.text: speaker was advertised as like new..and it was came in original box all accessories were included. decent shipping time. and the speaker itself was in pristine condition..I should have bought two! Sounds good..
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works well, plenty loud
customer_reviews.text: Rather bass-heavy as expected with certain types of music, (thumpy dance stuff, overproduced pop), but very clear sounding. Definitely loud enough, without noticeable distortion, to fill a large room or outdoor space. Good balance between highs and lows when playing older recordings that tend to be midrange-dominant (classic jazz, guitar rock). Connects reliably. Haven't tested battery life as I usually leave it plugged in in center of living space. Weird looking but I like it. Materials seem sturdy and well- assembled. A good modern replacement for worn-out old Bose Sounddock. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: The item didn't work after charging it for the required ...
customer_reviews.text: The item didn't work after charging it for the required time. It was bulkier than I had really imagined as I take my backpack with me daily. The combo of taking my lunch and this speaker wouldn't be ideal especially on a motorcycle. Didn't get to experience the quality of the bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: is basically perfect. You're effectively getting Audi features for a Volkswagen ...
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth speakers can be iffy and/or usually come with trade-offs. This speaker, however, is basically perfect. You're effectively getting Audi features for a Volkswagen price tag. LOUD, bass that doesn't play, and clear sound. Looks cute also.
customer_reviews.author: ApesFromSpace

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is great. After shopping around for a few days
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. After shopping around for a few days, this came across my search. A LOT of bang for your buck here. I use this at work and my customers love it. They say it sounds like we installed speakers in the walls because the sound fills the entire sound with a warm, rich bass.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Turner

customer_reviews.title: This thing is Bad Ass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker a couple years ago. This thing is Bad Ass!!! Sounds awesome. Great rechargeable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mears

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it sounds with my music and when phone calls come in. Love the surround sound when watching movies at work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great portability
customer_reviews.text: Why I got this: Gift for my brother-in-law who is very much into music. Pros: Great sound, great portability, and easy set-up. No complaints whatsoever. Cons: None.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

Bluetooth 4.0 Wireless Music Streaming with NFC Easy Pairing
Built in Microphone for Hands free Calling
Built-in USB Charging, Built-in Concealed Carry Handle
